gw.api.builder

Class AnswerBuilder<T extends PCAnswerDelegate,B extends AnswerBuilder<T,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<T,B>
      • gw.api.builder.AnswerBuilder<T,B>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueGenerator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocationAnswerBuilder, PeriodAnswerBuilder, PolicyLineAnswerBuilder

    public abstract class AnswerBuilder<T extends PCAnswerDelegate,B extends AnswerBuilder<T,B>>
extends DataBuilder<T,B>
    Base builder for creating various answer entities such as PolicyLineAnswer and LocationAnswer.
    Author:
    hhuang

    • Method Detail

      • createBean

        protected T createBean(BuilderContext context)
        Overrides:
        createBean in class DataBuilder<T extends PCAnswerDelegate,B extends AnswerBuilder<T,B>>

      • getPublicIDByQuestionChoiceCode

        protected java.lang.String getPublicIDByQuestionChoiceCode(java.lang.String choiceCode)
        Verifies that the given string is one of the choices available for the answer question. An exception is thrown if #withQuestionCode(String) was not already called before invoking this method, or if the question type is not "choice", or if the argument string does not match the ChoiceCode of any QuestionChoice.
        Parameters:
        choiceCode - the choiceCode specified for the choice
        Returns:
        the publicId of the QuestionChoice

      • withAnswerValue

        public B withAnswerValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the appropriate answer field based on the type of question. This requires that #withQuestionCode(String) be called first, so the method can deduce the expected type of the answer. Throws if the question was not already set, or if the argument "value" cannot be cast to the expected type.

      • withQuestionByPublicIdAndAnswerValue

        public B withQuestionByPublicIdAndAnswerValue(java.lang.String questionPublicId,
                                              java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the question by calling withQuestionByPublicId(String) and then sets the answer value by calling withAnswerValue(Object).
        Parameters:
        questionPublicId - the publicID of a Question defined in the product model
        value - the value for the answer

      • withQuestionByCodeIdentifierAndAnswerValue

        public B withQuestionByCodeIdentifierAndAnswerValue(java.lang.String questionCodeIdentifier,
                                                    java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the question by calling withQuestionByCodeIdentifier(String) and then sets the answer value by calling withAnswerValue(Object).
        Parameters:
        questionCodeIdentifier - the code identifier of a Question defined in the product model
        value - the value for the answer

      • withQuestionByPublicId

        public B withQuestionByPublicId(java.lang.String questionPublicId)
        Sets the question for this answer.
        Parameters:
        questionPublicId - the publicID of a Question defined in the product model

      • withQuestionByCodeIdentifier

        public B withQuestionByCodeIdentifier(java.lang.String questionCodeIdentifier)

        Parameters:

      • withChoiceAnswer

        public abstract B withChoiceAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        Sets the answer value to the given choice answer. The #withQuestionCode(String) method must be called first so we can ensure that the answer is a valid choice. Throws if the given answer is not valid.
